name: Citizens of Earth - A Modern RPG (Demo available now!)
blurb: A modern RPG that places you in the shoes of the Vice President of the World and all of the heroes are regular people!

rewards.reward: No Reward

Grab Bag o' Badges\r\n============================== \r\nThanks for your support! When the game launches, you'll receive an exclusive code to redeem in-game that will randomly give you 3 Badges for the VP to wear, each conferring unique gameplay bonuses to your team!

I want Citizens of Earth!
==============================
A DRM free digital copy of Citizens of Earth for the PC, Linux, or Mac! (And a Steam key if we release on there!) The estimated release price is $20, so you get to save some money by jumping in early.

Plus, receive a playable demo of Citizens of Earth as soon as the project is funded so you can get a taste of the game sooner!

Help the Citizens of Earth!
==============================
Get a playable demo of Citizens of Earth as soon as the project is funded in order to try out the game and send your feedback to the team. In addition, receive exclusive Beta builds of the game  to see how the game is developing and help the development team shape the game through your feedback.
==============================
Includes previous reward tiers.

Exclusive Prologue Story
============================== 
On the game's launch, get instant access to an in-game side story detailing how the VP "kickstarted" his political campaign...and made a few enemies along the way. Features a new Citizen to recruit and a new area to explore with fresh challenges awaiting you. Bonus: Get 1 of 3 hi-res desktop wallpapers.
============================== 
Includes a digital copy of the game and Beta access.

The world of Citizens of Earth
==============================
Receive a pdf encyclopedia of the world of Citizens of Earth! Featuring exclusive art and concepts from the game and background information on all of the game's characters and locations. If you love the art and story in an RPG, this is the reward for you! Bonus: Get 2 of 3 hi-res desktop wallpapers.
==============================
Includes a digital copy of the game, playable demo as soon as the campaign is funded, and beta access.

Your ears deserve a reward too!
============================== 
Get the soundtrack to Citizens of Earth, composed by Scott McFadyen, who also composed the fantastic music of our last game, Waveform! http://scottmcfadyen.bandcamp.com/. Bonus: Get all 3 hi-res desktop wallpapers.
==============================
Includes a digital copy of the game, playable demo as soon as the campaign is funded, beta access, and the pdf Encyclopedia.

Citizens of Earth Digital Collectable Cards
============================== 
In addition to being super stylish, these superhero-themed collectible cards go into detail about each Citizen's background, stats, abilities, equipment, and strategies. They're not only a source of pride to show off to your friends, but you can keep them handy while playing the game as a source of reference for your favourite Citizens.
============================== 
Includes a digital copy of the game, playable demo as soon as the campaign is funded, beta access, the pdf Encyclopedia, the soundtrack, and all 3 hi-res desktop wallpapers.

Join the VP's political entourage
============================== 
As a member of the VP's party, all backers at this level get to vote on a new Citizen to be added to the game that you will receive exclusive access to upon launch. In addition, you tell us your name and a bit about you and we'll send you a personalized e-letter from the VP on official presidential letterhead welcoming you to his party. Your contribution to Citizens of Earth will forever be immortalized in your very own unique letter, signed by the members of the team and the VP himself, and your name will be added to the game's credits!
============================== 
Includes a digital copy of the game, playable demo as soon as the campaign is funded, beta access, the pdf Encyclopedia, the soundtrack, the digital trading cards, and all 3 hi-res desktop wallpapers.

Plant a Tree!
============================== 
Choose from one of a dozen trees designed by Robin and work with Chris to place it wherever your heart desires. And choose a special message to be shown when the player examines it. Hide it in a secret place, or place it next to your friend's tree. Whatever you want!
============================== Includes a digital copy of the game, playable demo as soon as the campaign is funded, beta access, the pdf Encyclopedia, the soundtrack, all 3 hi-res desktop wallpapers, the digital trading cards, and access to the VP's political entourage.

Get your face in the game
============================== 
Throughout the world of Citizens of Earth are many aesthetic features common to our world - billboards, paintings, posters, and so on. Here's your chance to get your face plastered forever in the world of Citizens of Earth. And as a bonus, you  can choose the text that pops up when the VP examines your face. ==============================
Includes a digital copy of the game, playable demo as soon as the campaign is funded, beta access, the pdf Encyclopedia, the soundtrack, all 3 hi-res desktop wallpapers, the digital trading cards, access to the VP's political entourage, and your own special tree!

Be a Level Designer! (Part 1) ==============================
Own your own piece of property in the Citizens of Earth world. Work alongside Chris to design your very own home, be it a house, apartment, deserted tropical island, etc. You can also choose one of the enemies in the game to represent your virtual self and choose its dialogue as well. And your name will be in the credits as a Location Designer.
==============================
Includes a digital copy of the game, playable demo as soon as the campaign is funded, beta access, the pdf Encyclopedia, the soundtrack, all 3 hi-res desktop wallpapers, the digital trading cards, access to the VP's political entourage, and your own special tree!

Be a Level Designer! (Part 2) ==============================\r\nWork with Chris to design a new level to explore. As part of the "Broader, not Longer" focus of the game, there are tons of nooks and crannies to explore, and you can help us make one! We use the freely available Tiled level editor (http://www.mapeditor.org/) so you can literally help us make the level, or dictate your design to Chris who'll make it for you. And your name will be in the credits as a Junior Level Designer. ==============================\r\nIncludes a digital copy of the game, playable demo as soon as the campaign is funded, beta access, the pdf Encyclopedia, the soundtrack, all 3 hi-res desktop wallpapers, the digital trading cards, access to the VP's political entourage, and your own special tree!

Create your own Enemy
==============================
Work alongside Robin to create one of the enemies you'll encounter in the game! The possibilities are pretty endless, including making an enemy that looks like you in case you want to give yourself a virtual beatdown for some reason. Either way, Robin will work with you to design the character in the style of the game and you'll be added to the credits as an Assistant Enemy Designer. And as a bonus, we'll animate the character according to your ideas as well! ==============================
Includes a digital copy of the game, playable demo as soon as the campaign is funded, beta access, the pdf Encyclopedia, the soundtrack, all 3 hi-res desktop wallpapers, the digital trading cards, access to the VP's political entourage, and your own special tree!

Be a Level Designer! (Part 3) ============================== Work with Chris to design not just a new level to explore, but the pocket reality in which it takes place! Many of the Citizens have abilities that allow you to access different parts of reality, like a character's subconscious, a dream state, etc. Many of the normal rules are suspended in these pocket realities, so feel free to go crazy! And your name will be in the credits as an Assistant Level Designer. ==============================\r\nIncludes a digital copy of the game, playable demo as soon as the campaign is funded, beta access, the pdf Encyclopedia, the soundtrack, all 3 hi-res desktop wallpapers, the digital trading cards, access to the VP's political entourage, and your own special tree!

Create your own Enemy ULTIMATE EDITION ============================== If you really want to create your own enemy for Citizens of Earth but also want a chance to design the gameplay of the enemy, choose this reward to work alongside Ryan in the development of your enemy's battle abilities and overworld behaviour and get added to the credits as an Enemy Designer. Plus, design a unique quest that involves finding and defeating this enemy! If you want the thrill of seeing your enemy intrigue and challenge players around the world, let's make it happen together! ==============================\r\nIncludes a digital copy of the game, playable demo as soon as the campaign is funded, beta access, the pdf Encyclopedia, the soundtrack, all 3 hi-res desktop wallpapers, the digital trading cards, access to the VP's political entourage, and your own special tree!

Create your own Citizen
============================== 
Work alongside Robin to create one of the Citizens of Earth! Whether you want a character that looks like you or something out of your imagination, Robin will work with you to design the character in the style of the game. And as a bonus, we'll animate the character according to your ideas as well. And since each Citizen is a recruitable character for your team, you'll be able to play through the game as your created Citizen!

Please note that since the whole point of the game is that each Citizen is a normal person, we'll work with you to come up with the profession of the Citizen. This will of course influence his or her appearance, but we'll make sure the Citizen matches your original vision. 
==============================
Includes a digital copy of the game, playable demo as soon as the campaign is funded, beta access, the pdf Encyclopedia, the soundtrack, all 3 hi-res desktop wallpapers, the digital trading cards, access to the VP's political entourage, and your own special tree!

Create your own Citizen ULTIMATE EDITION
============================== 
If you really want to create your own Citizen with Robin but aren't content to just stop at the art, choose this reward to also work alongside Ryan in the development of your Citizen's battle abilities, signature World Ability, and recruitment quest, and get credited in the game as a Character Designer. Plus, work with Ryan to develop the signature side story quest of one of the Citizens. If you want the thrill of seeing the world pick your character for their ultimate team of Citizens and inspire the world with your design prowess, choose this reward and let's make some magic together!
==============================
Includes a digital copy of the game, playable demo as soon as the campaign is funded, beta access, the pdf Encyclopedia, the soundtrack, all 3 hi-res desktop wallpapers, the digital trading cards, access to the VP's political entourage, and your own special tree!

Dinner with the Vice President
============================== 
If you happen to live (or can get to) somewhere at the same time Ryan is there (pretty much anytime in the Vancouver area, sparingly in Toronto and San Francisco), Ryan will cosplay as the Vice President of the World and take you out for dinner anywhere you'd like to go. On your night of adventure you can play Citizens of Earth together, find people to win over with your charm and charisma, or any other amazing, once-in-a-lifetime things that you'd like to do with the Vice President of the World!
==============================
Includes a digital copy of the game, playable demo as soon as the campaign is funded, beta access, the pdf Encyclopedia, the soundtrack, all 3 hi-res desktop wallpapers, the digital trading cards, access to the VP's political entourage, and your own special tree!

Be a Game Designer!
============================== 
Have you ever thought to yourself, "I really wish I could play an RPG with _____________ feature"? Well now's your chance to see that wish come true! Work with Ryan to develop your own custom gameplay feature for Citizens of Earth and be credited in the game as an Assistant Game Designer. He'll transform into your own code monkey as he commands your wish into existence using only his fingertips. Note: Please don't crush any hopes of the game actually releasing by asking for crazy features, like an entire second game playable within Citizens of Earth! Feel free to contact us with ideas to verify viability.
==============================
Includes a digital copy of the game, playable demo as soon as the campaign is funded, beta access, the pdf Encyclopedia, the soundtrack, all 3 hi-res desktop wallpapers, the digital trading cards, access to the VP's political entourage, and your own special tree!

President of the World!
==============================
At least, of the world of the development of Citizens of Earth! You'll be credited as an Executive Producer in the game and basically become a member of the team. Receive access to our project server to get new versions of the game as it's being developed so that you can play as much of the game as you could ever want and impact each step and aspect of the development.  Chat with us live on Skype or Google Chat about any and all aspects of the game and join us for our weekly team meetings. If you're interested in game development, this reward was custom-made for you! Provide insight and feedback into art, music, story, gameplay, and anything else your heart could possibly desire. You truly will impact Citizens of Earth in a way that no one else will. One caveat - you must be 18 years or older since you'll have to sign an NDA to make sure you don't do anything nefarious with the unprecedented level of access you'll receive!
==============================
Includes a digital copy of the game, playable demo as soon as the campaign is funded, beta access, the pdf Encyclopedia, the soundtrack, all 3 hi-res desktop wallpapers, the digital trading cards, access to the VP's political entourage, and your own special tree!
